weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I'm around.
🌧️ Pitter-patter!

weather.question: I am big and bright and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and round.
😎 You can't look directly at me.
🔥 I rise in the morning.

weather.question: I'm cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of tiny ice crystals.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I move the trees and blow your hat off. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 Kites like me a lot!
🌬️ Whee! I make things sway.

weather.question: I'm a big, puffy thing in the sky, sometimes gray and sometimes white. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep sometimes.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌫️ I can bring rain or sunshine.

weather.question: I sometimes come after the rain and show many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
🌦️ I need both sun and rain to appear.
✨ Some people think there's gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a storm with lots of wind and rain. Sometimes, trees fall down because of me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚠️ Stay inside when I come!
⛈️ I can be very noisy.
⚡Sometimes, I have lightning.

weather.question: I am very bright and hot, and sometimes come with thunderstorms. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am like a giant spark.
🌩️ You can hear thunder after you see me.
💡 I can light up the sky.

weather.question: I'm the loud sound that comes after lightning during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I rumble and roar.
🌩️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 Cover your ears when you hear me!

weather.question: I am a big storm that forms over warm ocean water. I have strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I can cause big floods.
🏠 Stay inside and be safe from me.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I have four legs.
🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈 I am a small furry animal.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass in a field.
🐄 I am a large farm animal.
⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I quack and swim. I have webbed feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I lay eggs.
💦 I like to swim in a pond.
🧡 My beak is orange.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a very big cat.
🍖 I eat meat.

animal.question: I hop and eat carrots. I have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat vegetables.
🐇 I have soft fur.
🌱 I can be found in a garden.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I live in Africa and Asia. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very big animal.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🦣 I can use my nose to pick things up.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I hiss.
🌿 I like to hide in the grass.
🥶 I am cold-blooded.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I can squirt ink.
💎 I have no bones.

animal.question: I am a bird that cannot fly, and I waddle a lot. I live in a very cold place. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I like to eat fish.
❄️ I live in Antarctica.
⚫ I am black and white.
